item.description:
Great Boston NLP & Hypnosis Meetup - Lexington

Topic: Group Hypnosis - How Does it Feel to be Part of a Stage Show Group

My recent show brought a lot of questions from friends and family, like were they really under hypnosis?  And since I knew several people that were up in the 'committee", their reactions went from, "I don't remember doing that." to "It felt so good."

These comments are common and what is most common is that people don't understand hypnosis in a stage show.

This week I'd like to explain what stage hypnosis is and then hypnotize the group as I would in a stage show.  Don't worry, you won't embarrass yourself, as there will be no audience and I will not suggest an ridiculous things.

This will just be so you an experience what it is like.

Come and Have Fun.

 

Kevin Martin, CHT

www.poseffects.com

978-494-4542

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Lexington- Group Hypnosis - How Does it Feel to be Part of a Stage Show Group
